Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are electrical energy conversion devices with high efficiency and low pollution.
Titulo: Evaluation of a sol-gel process for the synthesis of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ cathodic multilayers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In order to increase performances of SOFCs at intermediate temperature (700-800degreesC) and to decrease materials cost, an alternative sol-gel synthesis method has been investigated to deposit La1-xSrxMnO3+delta (LSMx) as cathode thin films.
Titulo: Evaluation of a sol-gel process for the synthesis of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ cathodic multilayers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Polycrystalline LSMx thin films were prepared by dip-coating using a polymeric solution.
Titulo: Evaluation of a sol-gel process for the synthesis of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ cathodic multilayers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Lanthanum, strontium and manganese nitrates were used as raw materials.
Titulo: Evaluation of a sol-gel process for the synthesis of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ cathodic multilayers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The viscosity of the solution was adjusted and the solution was deposited on polycrystalline ZrO2-8% Y2O3 ceramics.
Titulo: Evaluation of a sol-gel process for the synthesis of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ cathodic multilayers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Prior to experiments, the substrate surface was eroded until a roughness of 20 nm and then cleaned with ethanol and dried.
Titulo: Evaluation of a sol-gel process for the synthesis of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ cathodic multilayers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Film thicknesses were adjusted with the number of layers.
Titulo: Evaluation of a sol-gel process for the synthesis of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ cathodic multilayers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Porosity and grain size of monolayers or multilayers were evaluated.
Titulo: Evaluation of a sol-gel process for the synthesis of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ cathodic multilayers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Typical thickness of monolayer is 250 nm.
Titulo: Evaluation of a sol-gel process for the synthesis of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ cathodic multilayers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A key parameter in the multilayer process was the intermediate calcination temperature (400, 700 or 1000degreesC) of each further layer deposition.
Titulo: Evaluation of a sol-gel process for the synthesis of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ cathodic multilayers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A correlation between this intermediate temperature and morphology, thickness and porosity was found; porosity is ranging from 3 to 40% and thickness can reach 1 micron for multilayers.
Titulo: Evaluation of a sol-gel process for the synthesis of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ cathodic multilayers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Concerning electrochemical performances, the best results were obtained for LSM0.4 multilayers with an intermediate calcination temperature (called T-i) of 400degreesC. (C) 2004 Elsevier B.V.
Titulo: Evaluation of a sol-gel process for the synthesis of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ cathodic multilayers for solid oxide fuel cells
